body.name: EPOMAKER Ajazz AK820 Pro 75% Mechanical Keyboard, Gasket-Mounted Gaming Keyboard with TFT Smart Display&Knob, Bluetooth 5.1/2.4G Wireless/Type-C Wired Custom Keyboard (Purple, Gift Switch)
features: 【TFT Screen: The Interactive Interface】AK820 Pro mechanical keyboard comes equipped with a TFT Screen, serving as your interactive interface for real-time updates and customization. The high-definition display allows for customizable visuals, battery status, date & time display, connectivity & OS display, and backlight effects. With this TFT Screen feature breakdown, it’s easily to understand the full range of its capabilities.

【A Popular 75% Compact Design】Designed for both enthusiasts and professionals alike, the Ajazz AK820 Pro offers a combination of innovation and craftsmanship that's hard to beat. This 75% compact mechanical keyboard maximize your desk space and enjoy a sleek look with this 75% layout. It's also perfectly portable, allowing for seamless typing experiences, delivering a superior typing experience without compromising on features or functionality, wherever you are.

【Wireless & Wired Connectivity】The Ajazz AK820 Pro supports connection via Bluetooth or 2.4GHz for wireless connectivity, or with the included Type-C USB cable. With Bluetooth 5.1, the keyboard responses faster and save more power than the former Bluetooth versions. The keyboard is also easily switched among the three modes for efficient multitasking and speedy performance. Included 4000mAh battery ensures a long and steady use, without worries of short out.

【Gasket-mounted & Flex-cut PC Plate and PCB】Experience a typing feel like never before with our gasket-mounted design coupled with a Flex-cut PC plate and PCB. The gasket mounting method isolates the plate and PCB from the case, significantly reducing vibration and noise. In the meanwhile, the Flex-cut design in both the PC plate and PCB allows for a slightly flexy, yet stable typing experience. Every keypress is both cushioned and precise.

【South-facing LEDs with 1.6M RGB】Illuminate your setup with the Ajazz AK820 Pro's vibrant LED backlighting, featuring South-facing LEDs that offer superior shine-through capabilities. With a staggering 1.6 million color combinations, you can customize your RGB lighting profiles to suit your mood, occasion, or overall aesthetic.

【Mac/Win Compatibility】What's more, the keyboard is fully compatible with both Mac and Windows operating systems, ensuring that you can enjoy the full range of its features irrespective of your computing preferences. With the customizable TFT screen, you can easily switch between Win and Mac modes, enhancing your overall usability and productivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Punches WAY above its weight class
reviews.reviewText: I’m a keyboard enthusiast with 5 mechanical keebs that I’ve modded up the wazoo - most of which costing between 90-150 dollars. I’ve done tape mods, stabilizer mods, experimented with a variety of switches and keycap profiles, put car sound deadening foam in the cases, etc.This thing sounds better stock (more clacky than thocky) out of the box than anything else I own. I can actually leave this keeb alone and not feel like I need to upgrade anything at all.It also has features like south facing RGBs and polycarbonate plate and sound insulation, features usually on present in keebs costing 3x as much. The switches - smooth and superb. Keycaps are great thickness and quality.Do yourself a favor and just buy it. You will be so pleasantly surprised. I bought it as a “budget mod platform” to gift to a friend - ended up switching out the keycaps just for color profile purposes and buying a second one for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars keys don't light up, but doesn't stop it from being a good product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the white/purple color scheme, and it is a very nice keyboard. I got the flying fish switches and they sound nice, and the led work really well. Haven't figured out how to change the design of the led screen yet but overall amazing keyboard. LEDS are amazing and its software as well, but the keycaps aren't see through so if that is a gripe just get different keycaps. Awesome overall !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars extremely great keyboard out the box
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard sounds and looks phenomenal and works great, the only thing I would want to change is to make it a little bit easier customizing it and finding drivers online for said customization because if you're doing it through the buttons and key binds, it can get a little tiresome and ineffective

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great value and exceeded expectations for the price
reviews.reviewText: the stock sound of this keyboard is great and the keycaps are very nice looking! the bluetooth and wireless receiver work well and I was able to easily navigate the software and customize the screen. I take this keyboard with me to do work at various places and it's light enough to not be burdensome. i swapped out the switches easily and plan to get some new keycaps too, the board still sounds really good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the sound! Creamy like. The LCD screen is also cute, have a gif inserted already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite mechanical keyboard yet!
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the this a great keyboard for the price! I went with the flying fish switches which had that ”thocky” sound I’ve been in search of right out the box. I love that it has a volume knob and a display screen. (which is customizable) Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buen teclado y sonido
reviews.reviewText: Vale totalmente la pena si no buscas un teclado ruidoso y con un tacto suave. Buena conexión y pantalla LED excelente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cordless keyboard with display and volume control knob
reviews.reviewText: This cordless keyboard has three connection methods: Bluetooth (with up to three paired devices), 2.4GHz with USB dongle, and USB C (which also charges the keyboard.The keys are not shine-through, so while it’s backlit, don’t expect to be able to see the lettering on the keys in the dark. The lights are directly under the keycaps, though, so you can purchase a set of replacement keys if that’s desired. The keys do appear to be double-shot molded, so the lettering won’t wear down over long use, which is a really nice feature that often goes unnoticed.Out of the box it’s charged past 75%, and the time is within 5 minutes of the correct time, given the time zone is somewhere in Asia. It comes set to windows mode, and the knob controls the volume.The Bluetooth can pair up to three devices, press Fn+Q, or W, or E to switch between the three, and press and hold to go into pairing mode for each. Pairing was easy and straightforward.The settings menu can be entered by pressing Fn and the volume knob (which can be pressed like a button). The settings menu is in Chinese, but scrolling to the language menu is easy and obvious - it has both a Chinese character and “en” in the menu icon.The keys are fairly tactile, and the click is muted and soft, but this is not a quiet keyboard. The overall construction is good, the case feels stiff and doesn’t flex under use, and it hard to flex on purpose when twisting it by hand.It has two heights with the kick kickstands. They seem fairly secure, though I worry they could come off and be lost like every other keyboard.The USB dongle is held in with a magnet, which concerned me as it might also get lost, but hitting the keyboard into my hand wasn’t enough to dislodge it, so it may stick around for awhile. The dongle is labeled AJAZZ so it should be easy to put back with the keyboard later if misplaced and found again.Typing with it works well, and in Bluetooth with my fast typing speed it didn’t miss a single letter - definitely a good keyboard as I’ve reviewed several wireless keyboards that just didn’t work consistently under my usage.Lastly, I’m glad it has real arrow keys in the normal arrangement. This makes so many keyboards useless for me. The placement of the delete key isn’t great, but since this is a small keyboard it’s an ok trade off.Overall I’m excited to have this keyboard, and will see how it works as my daily keyboard going forward.

Almost everything you would want in a keeb for a low price.Pros:-Hotswappable-Gasket mounted-Flex-cut PC plate and PCB-South-facing LEDs with full RGB-Customizable per-key RGB and macros with proprietary software-Stock keycaps are PBT-Stock switches (Gift) sound very thocky out of the box (with the exception of the spacebar)-Connectivity: Type-C Wired, 2.4GHz wireless, Bluetooth 5.1 with up to 3 different devices-Mac and Windows compatible-Comes with a knob for volume control and play/pause-NKRO support-1000Hz polling rate support in Wired mode-4,000mAh battery for wireless modeCons:-Although per-key customization is allowed through their proprietary software, it is not officially QMK/VIA-Depending on your preference, ABS plastic case may be considered lower quality-Stock stabs are not screw-in-Stock keycaps are not shine-through-Amazon pricing is more expensive than ordering direct from EpomakerConclusion:Great budget beginner keyboard for those looking to get into modding their own board. I ended up swapping out the stock switches for Gateron Milky Yellow Pros (lubed and filmed) and also switched out the keycaps for a different look. Board feels and sounds like a premium board now. Although I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and sound of the stock switches out of the box - they were quite thocky (with the exception of the spacebar).

Mi sento di scrivere questa recensione perché l'80% di quelle che si trovano sulla pagina si riferiscono ad un'altra tastiera e non a quella che viene spedita ora.La tastiera é una ajazz ak820pro, meccanica, con led rgb, collegamento via cavo+bt+chiavetta a2.4g . Compatibile sia con windows che con mac.Gli switch sono hot-swap, layout iso da tastiera americana internazionale.E comoda, compatta, robusta. Da una bella sensazione al tatto e gli switch non sono mali, anzi, la barra dello spazio fa proprio un bel thock.Il mini schermo é la chicca, inutile ma sfizioso.La ricomprerei senza dubbio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Why haven't I tried these before
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard. It's my first AJAZZ and it's amazing. I'm still exploring it. I love how I can connect it 3 different ways to suit my location situation... 2.4g mode, Bluetooth, and usb wired ( lead supplied)The keys are nice and cluncky and spaced perfectly for my finger spread. I like the funky colour lights effect, my favourite is everything else it does though. I can change the keys around ( tool supplied) and I like the plastic keyboard cover it comes with to protect it from dust. I miss that on the new keyboards that don't come with one. I also like that it has a volume control, brightness control, pause, playback, next track, email, calculator and loads more. This is amazing for me, I've not used one like this before and I'm so impressedI'm playing with this keyboard as I'm writing this review because I keep finding different functions and I want to mention them hereIt's not a light weight one there is some weight in it and it's not a keyboard I would use for traveling because of the weight but for taking to the office and back wouldn't be a problem although this one is staying permenantly at home solely for my use and away from envious eyes or it will probably develop legs and disappear if I take it to work. I actually got this for my mini pc but I'm going to use it as my main keyboard for all devices because it makes the other keyboards seem lacking in too many ways.If you want the full operations for the keyboard you need to download the driver from the AJAZZ website. The details are in the box it comes in.You can connect to windows and Mac although I'm on windows I haven't tried it on Mac.The instructions are in the box but I suggest having a full play with it. It's quite an enlightening experience for a novice like me. I'll probably be here for the rest of the afternoon playing with this - it's my new 'go to' toy

reviews.reviewTitle: キーボード好きにはたまらない商品
reviews.reviewText: スクリーンが付いていることの好奇心でAK820 Proを購入。カラーはグレー、軸はflying fish switch。レビューの方に海外の方が多いので日本向けにレビューを書きます。まず前提として、日本で使用する場合の注意点が2つ。まず、このキーボードには技適マークが記載されていないため日本国内での無線接続は非推奨。（電波法違反になるため）無線で接続できないこともないですが、有線での接続を推奨します。またAK820 proは英字配列のため、日本語配列を使っている方は配列に慣れる必要があります。良かった点・打鍵音のなめらかさ・ソフトウェアの幅広いカスタム・素材の品質が高い（PBTキーキャップ）・スクリーンの発色が鮮やかで明るく綺麗好き嫌いが分かれそうな点・打鍵感が少し重め・キーボード充電中は右に赤いランプが点灯していて目に入りやすい（充電が終わると消える）良くない点・キーキャップが不透明なためRGBバックライトの光が通りづらい（F1～delキーまでのRGBバックライトはほとんど見えない）・ソフトウェアの起動方法がわかりづらい/macはソフトウェアダウンロードが不可能・説明書やソフトウェアが日本語に対応していない基本的にタイピングをする用途であれば使用する際の悪い点はないと感じます。ソフトウェアからGIFを用いて好きな動画をスクリーンに映すことが出来ますが、その発色が想像以上にはっきりしていて見えやすいです。打鍵感が少し重めなので、FPSなど瞬発力を求められるゲームをするには不向きだと思います。打鍵音に関してはコリコリとした音で静音を求める方にはおすすめです。キーボードだけでなくソフトウェアについても言及しておきます。ソフトウェアについては公式サイトでダウンロードすることができます。デスクトップショートカットを普通にクリックしても起動しないため、ショートカットを右クリックして管理者として実行を押すと起動します。説明書やソフトウェアは日本語に対応していませんが、大体直感で操作できるため機械に詳しければ特に問題はないといった印象です。キーボード好きには機能性もデザインもたまらないキーボードでした。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Solid Mechanical Keyboard With Some Bells And Whistles
reviews.reviewText: I love a good mechanical keyboard and this fits the bill. However, for the price tag you'd want more, and this is where 20 sets of RGB and versatile connectivity fits in. There are no issues with delays, whether it's USB, Bluetooth or WiFi connected, and the clacking of the keys is satisfying and responsive. There's a nice giant volume control dial and the RGB is nice a soft.
